alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 9:54AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Wood River at Hailey affecting Blaine County. .Expected heavy rainfall from showers and thunderstorms that have already started will continue through Monday evening. The rains will also accelerate snow melt, adding to water entering the Big Wood River. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Wood River at Hailey. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. The river stage is expected to reach minor flood stage tonight between 1100 PM and Midnight MDT. Currently, the expectations are for the river stage to continue at or above flood stage until at least 600 AM MST on Tuesday. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, or 2181 cfs... Street flooding will occur along Cedar, War Eagle, and Della Vista Drives in the lower subdivisions in Hailey and Riverview drive in Bellevue. Draper Preserve in Hailey is inaccessible. Water may be over some secondary roads in West Ketchum (Wood River Drive). Gimlet subdivision will have flooding issues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening to 5.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning to 4.1 feet and begin rising again early Saturday morning. It will rise to 4.3 feet Monday, June 20. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.6 feet on 04/27/2012. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Big Wood River Hailey 5.0 4.8 Sun 8 am MDT 5.4 4.8 4.3 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
